channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: 2013 Whirlwind Wheelchair Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: In this issue: Taking on the Lindy Point Trail Whirlwind Launches First Two WPACs Hand-Cycle Trike Prototype Ready to Ride Georgia Project Huge Success Will Power Ironside Download the 2013 Newsletter here .
item.content:encoded:
In this issue:

  • Taking on the Lindy Point Trail
  • Whirlwind Launches First Two WPACs
  • Hand-Cycle Trike Prototype Ready to Ride
  • Georgia Project Huge Success
  • Will Power
  • Ironside
